sect1.title: About this document
sect1.para: This is user guide for WinMerge. Please read this document carefully.
First chapter introduces new users into WinMerge, how and why was WinMerge created, by who and what it can do. Hopefully this is interesting reading for experienced WinMerge users too.
Second chapter is for users of previous WinMerge users, it lists important changes after 2.0 releases.
Third chapter describes getting WinMerge installer from Internet and installing WinMerge.
